mapper.select: SELECT "public".product."product_id", "public".product."product_name", "public".product."product_image", "public".product."product_price", "public".product.specification, "public".goods."goods_postage", "public".goods."goods_discount", "public".area."area_name", "public".shop."shop_name", "public".shop."shop_id" FROM "public".product JOIN "public".goods ON "public".product."goods_id" = "public".goods."goods_id" JOIN "public".shop ON "public".goods."shop_id" = "public".shop."shop_id" JOIN "public".area ON "public".goods."area_id" = "public".area."area_id" WHERE "public".product."product_id"=#{productId}
mapper.insert: insert into product( product_name, product_image, product_price, specification, product_stock, goods_id ) values( #{productName}, #{productImage}, #{productPrice}, #{spec}, #{productStock}, #{goodsId} )
